title: Interpretation of broth in a dream and the meaning of vegetable and chicken broth in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman preparing vegetable broth? Evidence of loss of worries and sorrows. What is the purpose of seeing spoiled broth? It indicates bad friends, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman preparing vegetable soup? Evidence of the collapse of economic problems. What does it mean to see vegetable broth Good for individuals? A guide to getting out of problems. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself eating hard bread with broth? Indication of fever. What does it mean to see yourself making chicken soup? A guide to getting rid of all problems and worries. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself eating chicken broth? A sign of many blessings. Interpretation of seeing vegetable broth in a dream: If the dreamer sees that he is eating vegetable broth in the dream, this is evidence of the fulfillment of dreams and desires. While seeing a married woman preparing vegetable broth in a dream symbolizes the loss of worries and sorrows. When a virgin girl sees vegetable broth, this indicates that she will be overcome Problems and crises. A pregnant woman seeing vegetable broth can symbolize an easy, natural birth. But if you see spoiled broth in a dream, this indicates bad friends, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing delicious broth in a young man’s dream indicates his approaching marriage. Vegetable broth in A dream for a single woman: If a virgin girl sees vegetable broth in a dream, this may mean that she will soon meet her partner. When a virgin girl sees broth in a dream, this means that she will reach a high position. But if a single girl sees good vegetable broth, a guide to getting rid of problems. Seeing cooking vegetable broth In the dream of an unmarried girl, it is a sign of examining affairs. This vision in a dream can also indicate many good things and blessings, and God is the Knower of the Unseen. As for seeing spoiled vegetable broth in a girl’s dream, it is a sign that she will be harmed. Vegetable soup in a dream Vegetable soup in a dream is a sign of the arrival of kindness, abundant nutrition and abundant money. If an unmarried girl sees cabbage soup, this is evidence that her life will change for the better, God willing. While a married woman sees vegetable soup in a dream, it symbolizes the collapse of economic problems. If a pregnant woman dreams of soup Cabbage, this may indicate the birth of a boy. Also, this vision may indicate in the sick dreamer’s dream that he will recover soon, God willing. If a divorced woman sees that she is eating vegetable soup, this is evidence of the fulfillment of aspirations and hopes. Eating bread and broth in a dreamWhen the sleeper sees that he is eating bread And broth in a dream, this may symbolize abundance of livelihood and money. This vision can also indicate in a dream that you will make a lot of profits and huge financial gains. If the dreamer sees that he is eating broth and bread, this is a sign of good fortune and good fortune. While seeing in a dream Eating bread with broth. It symbolizes facilitating the affairs of the fortuneteller, and God knows the unseen. Ibn Sirin showed that seeing hard bread with broth is a sign of fever. If the sleeper sees that he is eating bread without broth, this indicates that the saying is contaminated with epidemics and diseases. Eating broth and bread Together in a dream is a sign

title: The 12 most famous interpretations of seeing dreams according to the letters in the dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing Ihram? It means marriage for unmarried people and divorce for married men. What does it mean to see eggplant? This means that you will have money without fatigue and effort. What is the interpretation of seeing lightning? This indicates that you were on the path of misguidance, but God Almighty gave you guidance and repentance. What does incense mean? A pregnant woman gives birth to a boy. What is the interpretation of seeing a rosary? It states that you live with lawful money. Interpretation of seeing dreams according to the letters in the dream. Father: In a dream, father means the desires that you follow and want to fulfill. Adhan: If you hear the call to prayer during the months of Hajj, I will write a modern Hajj for you. As for one person, it means marriage. My brother: In the dream, it means that there is a good partner for you in work and trade, and you will get money from this partnership. Ihram: If he is a witness to the rituals of Ihram, then it is marriage for an unmarried person and divorce for a married person. Needle: It indicates the good advice that you give to people and for a pregnant woman it means giving birth to a female. Interpretation of the letter B in a dreamDreams according to the letters in the dream The letter ba in the word steamship means marriage and victory over a strong, cunning enemy or profit and money. Eggplant: If you see eggplant and it is on time, then this It means that you will have money without fatigue or trouble. The sink: In a dream, a corrupt man means that you know this basin, and if it is unknown, then it is an adulterous woman. Incense: For a pregnant woman to give birth to a boy, but for a man, people remember him as good, and the smell of incense is good words. Buzzing: It means the enemy, magic, and misfortunes. Lightning: indicates that you were on the path of misguidance, but God Almighty has given you guidance and repentance. Dates: If you intend to cooperate or open new projects, the dates mean that your money and work are permissible by God’s command. Owl: If he sees that an owl If you fall into a house, you will soon hear the news of someone’s death. Seeing the letter Ta’ in a dream. Takbeer: Seeing the takbeer indicates that you are always repenting to God Almighty, and knowing that you are saying takbeer means victory over opponents. Dating: Money, while eating dates in a dream means that you will be There is good news that will reach you soon. Figs: indicate offspring, money, and a child if you eat them, but if figs are too late, you are envied. Coffin: You will have a high status, and if you find yourself in a coffin, you will gain great status and power. Crown: indicates abundance Knowledge in religion, such as kingship. As for an unmarried woman, this means marriage, and for a pregnant woman, she will give birth to a son. Seeing the letter Tha’ in a dream. Breast: If a man sees that he is breastfeeding from an unknown person, this is a sign of an illness that has befallen him. Snake: indicates a jealous neighbor. And the hostility between your people and your children increases. The fox: Conflict with the fox means parental rivalry, while killing the fox means that you will get a pure and honest wife. Snow: The end of worries and sadness, but if the snow is in the summer, it indicates illness. Interpretation of the letter gym in a dream. The collector: means To the market, or to the ruler in the affairs of the people, and to the entrance to the mosque to support the oppressed. The buffalo: refers to the strong ruler whom the people fear. Jib

title: Learn about the interpretation of the dream of driving a luxury car by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about driving a luxury car: If you rode a luxury car in your dream and it happened in the dream world, then you feel very happy and expect that there are many beautiful events happening around you in reality with your livelihood increasing and you may have many special and wonderful things and you may buy some New things in your near life, what are the most important interpretations of the dream of driving a luxury car? We continue below. Interpretation of the dream of driving a luxury car: Sometimes a person’s life is not good and he suffers from bad financial conditions and he sees that he is driving a large and luxurious car in his vision, so dream scientists warn him of the meaning, as it is a sad sign of despair and a feeling of weakness as a result of not achieving his ambitions, which means The dreamer is going through a bad time and dreams that his circumstances will change, but unfortunately he is very sad, while the opposite happens when he sees the rich man riding in this car, so he is confident of himself and has a high and honorable rank. One of the indicators of driving a luxury car in a dream is that it is a good harbinger of an urgent change in circumstances. Economic and psychological, where a person can live comfortably and contentedly, after increasing the money he earns from his work. A black car indicates a distinct promotion, while a luxurious white car shows tremendous psychological stability, and living happily with a life partner. Interpretation of a dream about driving a luxury car by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin shows many interpretations of seeing a luxury car in a dream, and if one is looking for a good and halal diet Next, his Lord - Glory be to Him - will help him find her. Your goals, while in the event of a major accident due to this car, you will collide with some unfortunate events and affect your psychology. If you are working on a new project or have a business during this time and driving a luxury car, Ibn Sirin explains that your success during it will be impressive and you will gain a lot from money. You can spend your debts and get rid of the sorrows that you experienced earlier. Interpretation of a dream about driving a luxury car for a single woman: Driving in a luxury car for individuals indicates the tremendous success that they can achieve in their near life, as he is tall and gets a large income from his job. Dream scholars confirm many It is a distinctive symbol of driving a luxury car for singles, as this is a sign of a beautiful financial situation, and if she dreams of success and getting the partner she deserves, she will soon communicate with a wealthy person. This makes her very happy, and if the girl gets out of this car after arriving at the place she wants, this means that she will live with great success and complete happiness because she will achieve many goals in her life. When a woman sees that she is driving a luxurious black car, lawyers emphasize many beautiful symbols. She avoids serious worries and experiences and succeeds in her current relationship. Therefore, her partner is a wonderful person and has a special status among people, except for his good qualities: The girl has a luxurious blue car, and from here God Almighty responds to her prayers and lives in generosity and peace. Interpretation of the dream of driving a car in

title: Wearing socks in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Because this affects its meaning and its difference from one person to another, and this is what we are talking about today in our article in the following lines provided by our website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing wearing socks in a dream for a single girl. A single girl watches herself very happy after wearing new socks in a dream. And the vision A good omen for her is that she will enter a new period of her life full of success, nourishment, and optimism, God willing. As for the unmarried girl who sees that she is wearing worn or torn socks in a dream and is upset by that, the dream indicates that there are many problems that the dreamer will go through and that bother her a lot, and God knows best. He saw The unmarried girl is wearing new socks, and they were black, and he was happy with them in the dream. It means that he will enter into a new and appropriate job, and God knows best. It may indicate that the fortuneteller will get a promotion if he works, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl dreams of seeing her wearing new white socks In a dream. The vision indicates marriage or engagement in the near future, and God knows best. But if the socks are green in a dream for a single girl. This dream means that he will be blessed with abundance in a short time, and God knows best. But if an unmarried girl sees herself in the dream wearing yellow socks The dream symbolizes illness and fatigue, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing decorated socks in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing socks worn in a dream for a married woman. A married woman dreamed that she bought a large number of new socks and was very happy with them in the dream. The vision indicates the dreamer’s extreme happiness with her husband and her enjoyment of the atmosphere A safe and reassuring family, and God knows best. But when a married woman dreams that she wants to buy new socks but is unable to do so, the vision is a metaphor for a wise woman who is going through many crises with her husband, and God knows best. Seeing torn socks in large numbers in a dream for a married woman indicates the sadness of the dreamer. On crises and problems in her life, and God knows best. A married woman is late in giving birth and dreams of wearing new white socks. This dream is praiseworthy for her and a sign of pregnancy, which makes her and her husband very happy, and God knows best. Yellow socks appear in a dream and the married woman is wearing them, but she feels upset. It symbolizes The entry of a woman into the dreamer’s life. They do not wish her well, but rather plan to destroy her married life, and God knows best. But the married woman who appears to be wearing green socks in the dream. The best sign of pregnancy, and good offspring soon, God willing. Interpretation of seeing wearing socks in a dream about a man and its meaning: A man He dreams of losing his socks, so he searches for them and does not find them in the dream. This vision shows that he is suffering from some major problems in his life now, and God knows best. But if a man dreams that he is wearing severely torn socks in the dream, the vision confirms that he is facing obstacles in his life that prevent him from achieving what he wants. He wants, and God knows best, but it will end soon. When a man sees new socks in a dream and is satisfied with them, the dream symbolizes that the dreamer has finished with all the problems of his life, and God knows best. As for seeing light yellow socks,

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person eating red watermelon

preview.html: Seeing a dead person eating watermelon in a dream is considered one of the most promising visions, which has many meanings and connotations, which vary in interpretation from one person to another. Interpretation of seeing a dead person eating red watermelon in a dream for a single girl: Seeing a single girl in her dream that one of her deceased relatives was eating watermelon and watermelon tastes good. Sweet. This symbolizes the joy, happiness, and happiness that fills her life and she feels it. An unmarried girl eats watermelon with a dead man in a dream, and the watermelon tasted bad. This vision expresses that it will be a judgment or a great loss, and God Almighty is the Most High, All-Knowing. Seeing an unmarried girl A married woman in her dream is that she is eating watermelon with the deceased and it was out of season. This symbolizes the suffering and extreme stress that she is experiencing. Interpretation for a single man who saw that he was eating watermelon and this girl felt happy. Such a vision portends good and happy news for the girl in the very near future. Meaning of seeing A single or unmarried girl in a dream cuts a watermelon. This symbolizes that she will get engaged soon and her fiancé will be someone she loves and they have a strong love relationship. Seeing a single girl in a dream is a red watermelon. A sign and indication that she will soon communicate with a person with good morals, and with whom she will live a happy life You also see someone giving a single girl a piece of watermelon to eat. This is an indication that she will excel in her job. Seeing a single girl in her dream that a dead person gave her watermelon, and this watermelon has no seeds. The vision indicates that the unmarried girl will live a happy life. Seeing a girl symbolizes that A dead person gave her watermelon and ate with her. The vision is an indication that the dead person needs prayers from him, and God Almighty. See also: Seeing a dead person eating watermelon in a dream. Interpretation of seeing dead people eating red watermelon in a dream for a married woman. A married woman saw in her dream that the dead person was giving her watermelon and that the watermelon was yellow. This is a sign that he will suffer from illness. Seeing a married woman eating watermelon, it tastes delicious and sweet. A sign of kindness, livelihood, and a lot of money that she will get in the near future. Interpretation of seeing a dead person giving a married woman pieces of watermelon, and these pieces were small. This vision symbolizes The dreamer's life is full of evil people, haters, and haters who want and desire to harm her in any way. He must take care and be careful of these people, and avoid them. A married woman seeing in her dream that she was eating watermelon with enthusiasm, and she was happy about that. This reflects a happy, peaceful, and stable married life. Either the married woman saw that the deceased was giving her a watermelon, and this watermelon was red in color and tasted delicious. This is a sign and sign of sustenance, and the imminent goodness of this woman, which she will receive in the near future. Green watermelon in a dream is for a married woman and a dead person is giving her this watermelon. This vision symbolizes Indicates that she will become pregnant in the near future. Interpretation of seeing a dead person eating red watermelon in a dream for a man and its meanings: The man sees in his dream that the deceased gives him slices of watermelon, and these pieces were small, a sign of the abundance of goodness. Rotten watermelon in a dream.

title: Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about long hair: The interpretation of a dream about hair in a dream varies depending on who saw the dream, a man or a woman, and varies according to his social status, whether the woman is married or not pregnant or not, and it also differs if she has. Children or not. Therefore, we will present to you all these different interpretations of the dream of seeing hair in a dream, and we will present to you the most famous interpretations such as the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen, Al-Nabulsi, and many others. The interpretation of the dream of seeing hair varies, whether it is short or long. Seeing hair in a dream can be interpreted as a long life and a lot of money, and seeing hair in a dream for a pregnant woman can mean that she will give birth to a girl. Interpretation of a dream about long hair by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing hair in a dream varies depending on the viewer, if the viewer or the owner If one sees a rich person, then the hair is his money, and if one sees him poor, then the hair is his sins, and if he sees it. If the hair on the head is beautiful, then this is an honor and pride for its owner. Seeing long hair in a dream is a praiseworthy matter, especially for women, and whoever sees that his hair has grown, then it is an increase in knowledge and money. If a pregnant woman sees him, this indicates birth. If the dreamer is a man, this indicates his marriage, and if he is married, this indicates an increase in money and knowledge, and a man’s dream of long hair in a dream is evidence of kindness. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi’s long hair. Al-Nabulsi sees long hair as evidence of an increase. Knowledge and money for the person or visionary. Al-Nabulsi said: Whoever sees his hair has grown, his life will be prolonged, and whoever is poor and sees his hair long, then it is a debt that is accumulating on him. According to Al-Nabulsi, braids indicate debts, and cutting the mustache and removing armpit hair indicates the disappearance of these debts and their payment. Interpretation of a dream about long hair by Ibn ShaheenIbn Shaheen interprets the vision of hair In a dream, it is evidence of the dreamer’s worries, and if the dreamer is a woman, then it is an adornment for her and good. In the holy months, it is the payment of his debts to the pioneer and the end of his worries. The interpretation of a dream about long hair in a dream varies from one world to another according to the dreamer and his economic, social and religious status. Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a pregnant womanInterpretation of a dream about long hair for pregnant womenSome interpret it as the joy of those around her with pregnancy, and her intense joy With the pregnancy, and the joy of her husband and family with this pregnancy. However, others interpret it as the pregnancy of a beautiful girl whose parents are happy with her and very happy to see her. Interpretation of the vision: The pregnant woman’s long hair indicates the coming of goodness in her married life, ease of childbirth, and tolerance for the pain of childbirth. There are interpretations that indicate that This dream indicates the joy that will come with the arrival of goodness with the arrival of this new baby. Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a divorced woman. A dream about long hair for divorced women. Details about this topic. Divorced. Well, soon her husband may return to her. It may be the closeness of her children to her and their desire to live with her, or it may be her success in her job and her promotion in it. She may have a lot of money that helps her live a decent life, without problems and difficulties. Coming from women to get married.

title: The 12 most important interpretations of seeing the Bible in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the Gospel? A warning to a person to tell the truth. The meaning of seeing the Gospel is a quick and immediate recovery for whoever it was? She is suffering from an illness that remains. What is the interpretation of seeing the Bible for one girl? It means that she is doing good for the poor and giving them alms from her free money. What does buying the book mean? Holy? This means that she is a woman who influences the afterlife all over the world and that she is very fair. What is the interpretation of seeing the Gospel? God Almighty’s good news of the nearness of victory over them. Interpretation of seeing the Holy Bible in a dream. Dreaming of the Gospel means that a person fears God Almighty and stays away from worldly pleasures. Then the dream shows that the person prefers The afterlife is on this world and he stays away from what is forbidden to him. Seeing the Gospel is a warning to a person about the need to tell the truth and avoid false witness. So, the interpretation of seeing the Gospel is a quick and speedy recovery for someone who has suffered from an illness that has prolonged it. The dream indicates that you are a person interested in learning and knowing everything that is new and enlightened. And educated. Interpretation of the dream of reading the BibleReading the Bible, even if you are a seeker of knowledge, indicates your superiority and the acquisition of useful knowledge that others will benefit from. So why do we see the Bible in general as knowledge and knowledge that is correct and useful while reading from it? Then it is an indication that you are a knowledgeable and cultured person who seeks To acquire knowledge and benefit from the stronger side. It also indicates those who follow in the footsteps of righteous scholars and training at their hands. The Bible in a single woman’s dream. The interpretation of an unmarried girl’s vision of the Bible means that she is good for the poor and is given alms from her free money. And happy news comes to her, perhaps a lot of news about food or food. For a nice young man to propose to her. Buying a book from the Bible means that she is an educated girl who reads a lot about important topics. Then reading the Bible for an unmarried woman means promises are made between her and a specific person and she must fulfill her promise. A dream of the Bible for a married woman: Seeing the Bible in a woman’s house A married woman is a great good, according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. This means the good that enters her home and causes her happiness and joy. And seeing the Bibles basically means giving birth to a good son. After that, if a woman wants to get pregnant for a long time, and it can indicate promises between her and her life partner, and she must fulfill these promises. Then dreaming of buying a Bible means that she is a woman who affects the afterlife in the world and that she is fair Very.Whether she is a business owner, this is a big profit that she will get soon, and the Bible shows that she is an honest lady known for her justice among people.Seeing the Bible about a pregnant womanIf a woman is pregnant, if she sees the Bible during her sleep, then her child is a male by God’s command.This lady will give birth A very clever, fair and cultured girl, it will bring her a lot of good. If she has a problem with pregnancy, the Bible means the end of troubles and a speedy recovery. A Biblical dream of a man. The interpretation of a Biblical vision of a man as a victory over enemies, if there are people whom he fears and he is afraid Among them, the Holy Bible is the good news of God

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Nisaa in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Nisa’ in a dream. Interpretation of seeing reading Surat Al-Nisa’ in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Nisa’ in a dream. The article of Jaafar Al-Sadiq, may God be pleased with him. Whoever reads it in a dream or something from it or recites it to him. If he has a share in trade and an interest in industry. And God Almighty removed doubt and treachery from his heart, and it was said: He delays the prayer beyond its appointed time, and it is said: His death is near. Surah An-Najah, which is the Meccan surah according to the consensus of scholars, and consists of 46 verses and 179 words. May God’s prayers and peace be upon the Messenger before his migration, and it is said between Surahs Al-Naba’ and Al-Niftar, and it is arranged in the same order. According to the revelation of 81, while the order of the surah in the Uthmani Qur’an was 79. It is called Surat Al-An-Anza’at, Al-Sahira and Al-Tamam because it mentions the two words in the verses. We find that Surat Al-Naz’at explained the fate of every polytheist and disbeliever and whoever disobeyed the command of God Almighty and was given the next world and followed the desires and pleasures of this world. It also mentioned a few of the atrocities the world. On the Day of Resurrection.Reciting Surat Al-Nisa’ in a dream. Interpretation of Surat Al-Nisa’ in a dream by Ibn Sirini. Ibn Shirin says: Whoever sees him reciting Surat Al-Nazi’ in a dream. This is a good sign and an indication of the departure of worry and anxiety, the emergence of goodness, and the abundance of sustenance from God Almighty. This pain and sadness will go away from his heart and it will be solved. Its place is joy and happiness. Interpretation of Surat An-Nabulsi in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says: Whoever reads Surat Al-Naza’at in a dream, or if he hears it, will enjoy an abundance of food, succeed in his trade, and be lucky in it. Al-Nabulsi also believes that it is a sign of goodness and has many connotations. Thus, God removes betrayal and doubt from the heart. The dreamer, and grants him joy, happiness, and abundant living. He will be happy in both worlds, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. This vision may be a warning to the dreamer, an indication of delaying prayer beyond its due time, and a sign of his approaching death. The vision could be a sign of a person’s departure from God and his arrogance and an indication On his end, which will be a sermon and a passage for others, so he will return to God and repent for the sins he has committed. If one sees, hears, or reads Surah Al-Nazi’ in a dream and is sick, it may mean that his hours are approaching. Surat Al-Nazi’ in a dream for an unmarried woman Seeing Surat Al-Nazi’ in a dream An unmarried girl. A good sign and a sign that joy and happiness are approaching her and that the pain in her heart will go away.

It could indicate that the man is generous or that death is close to him, as seeing eating bananas brings a mood of pain, problems, and a feeling of permanent comfort, and the interpretation of seeing bananas. Fruit is different from bananas, as bananas indicate a good man with good morals. Interpretation of seeing and eating bananas in a dream: Bananas indicate a lot of money and goodness coming to the dreamer. Interpretation: Seeing bananas in a dream indicates healing of the sick and repentance from sins. It also indicates goodness of religion and regularity of worship. Bananas indicate To a woman who is pregnant with a male child. Bananas in a dream show a person piety and piety. When he dreams that he is eating bananas, this indicates that he will obtain money. Bananas in a dream indicate the fulfillment of dreams and goals. Seeing bananas for single people - which Interpretation of seeing bananas in a dream For a single girl, it indicates This indicates the proximity of happy news to her and good social relationships. When an unmarried woman sees that she is eating or buying bananas, this is a good sign that she will get married soon. Seeing a green banana girl shows how much people love that girl, while creating new and good relationships that benefit her. Yellow bananas are considered in The dream of an unmarried woman is evidence of the arrival of goodness and a lot of money to them. Bananas in the absolute general type for a girl indicate the fulfillment of the desires she seeks. The interpretation of seeing a banana for a pregnant woman is different. The interpretation of seeing and eating bananas in a dream. The fact that a pregnant woman is unmarried indicates ease of things and blessings in the diet and many more. Happy occasions for pregnant women. Bananas for a pregnant woman are evidence of a good and very good future for her and her husband. Bananas show the pregnant woman that she will give birth to a boy, God willing. Bananas indicate ease and imminent birth without disturbance. Bananas in general for a pregnant woman indicate hope, optimism and openness. Seeing a banana for a pregnant woman It means that she is wearing new clothes. If a pregnant woman is suffering during pregnancy and sees that she is eating yellow bananas, this indicates that the term is close. Interpretation of seeing a banana for a married woman brings Interpretation of seeing and eating bananas in a dream For a married woman, love and tenderness between her and her husband, this indicates good offspring for them Seeing a banana and eating it for a married woman indicates wealth and abundance of goodness for her. Seeing bananas for a woman indicates that she is fond of morals and piety, and a commitment to worship, and that she seeks to please her Lord in everything. Bananas in absolute terms for a woman indicate the good condition of her children and righteous offspring. Seeing a rotten banana For a woman, it indicates corruption of creation and disobedience to her children, and it also indicates disobedience for a woman. When a woman sees herself eating bananas from a tree, this is a sign of marital happiness and comfort that she enjoys. The interpretation of seeing a banana for a man is because it differs a lot.
